text: Terry Bradshaw is an American sports presenter and former athlete He was born September 2, 1948 in Shreveport, Louisiana. Bradshaw was a quarterback with the Pittsburgh Steelers in the National Football League. Since 1994, he is also a television and American football host. Over six years, he won four Super Bowl titles with Pittsburgh (1975, 1976, 1979 and 1980). He went into the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1989.
